pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Bayesian Algorithms for Binary and Categorical Data Regression Models // Efficient Bayesian implementations of probit, logit, multinomial logit and binomial logit models. Functions for plotting and tabulating the estimation output are available as well. Estimation is based on Gibbs sampling where the Markov chain Monte Carlo algorithms are based on the latent variable representations and marginal data augmentation algorithms outlined in Zens G., Frfchwirth-Schnatter S., Wagner H. (2020) arXiv:2011.06898.
